lead_paragraph: Michelle Kwan will skip the coming competitive season and attend the University of Denver. Kwan said yesterday that she would become a full-time student, but that she would continue to skate in exhibitions and would consider a return to competition next year. Kwan, 26, did not compete in the 2005-6 season because of a series of injuries. She was chosen for the United States Olympic team on a medical bye, then injured her groin in practice and withdrew.
